description:
Cute 1br/studio in the heart of Williamsburg.  One building away from the entrance to the L train, but quiet because it's in the back of the building.  Bedford Ave. has all of the food, bars, and shopping you could need, and you're 1 subway stop from Manhattan.

The apartment has hardwood floors, an exposed brick wall, and pressed tin ceilings.  I am renting it out because I have moved.  Most of my belongings will be removed and there's plenty of room for storage.
name: Cute 1br/Studio in the heart of Williamsburg
review: Good place with all the essentials. Located in a great area with restaurants, bars, stores, and the subway just around the corner.
